plot(x,friendShip1,'b-^','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;
plot(x,friendShip2,'g-o','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;
plot(x,friendShip3,'r-*','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;
plot(x,friendShip_simbet,'k-*','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;
plot(x,proximity_simbet,'y-*','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;
plot(x,epidemic,'m-*','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;
plot(x,transmission,'c-*','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;
plot(x,interest,'c-.','LineWidth',1.5);
hold on;

xlabel('Time Constraint / day');
ylabel('Delay / second');
axis([2,47,0.0,35000]);
legend('FriendShip-1','FriendShip-2','FriendShip-3','FriendShip-Simbet','Proximity-Simbet','Epidemic','Transmission Routing','Interest Routing',1);
